rules.title: Minimum GPA Requirement
rules.description: Applicants must have a minimum GPA of 3.0 to be considered for admission.

rules.title: Standardized Test Scores
rules.description: Submission of SAT/ACT scores is required. Minimum scores may apply depending on the program.

rules.title: Application Deadlines
rules.description: Applications must be submitted by the specified deadline to be reviewed for the upcoming term.

rules.title: Letter of Recommendation
rules.description: One or more letters of recommendation from teachers or mentors are required.

rules.title: Identity Proof
rules.description: Applicants must submit a government-issued photo ID, such as a passport, national ID card, or driver's license.

rules.title: Academic Transcripts
rules.description: Official transcripts from all previously attended educational institutions must be submitted.

rules.title: Passport Size Photographs
rules.description: Two recent passport-sized photographs are required for identity verification and student records.

rules.title: Proof of Address
rules.description: Applicants must submit valid proof of address, such as a utility bill, rental agreement, or bank statement.

rules.title: Medical Certificate
rules.description: A recent medical certificate verifying good health is required for enrollment.

rules.title: Application Fee Payment
rules.description: Applicants must pay a non-refundable application fee as part of the submission process. A receipt of payment should be uploaded.
